name: polybrute
baseline: 6-voices analog powerhouse, with unprecedented expressivity and sound morphing capabilities.

name: matrixbrute
baseline: Arguably the most power analog monophonic synthesizer ever.

name: minibrute
baseline: Addictive, inspiring step-sequencing synth with huge modular capabilities.

name: microfreak
baseline: A synthesizer like no other. A Peculiar and exceptional instrument that rewards the curious musician.
